attributes.action: STOP  persistent driving (and therefore speeding) in the overtaking lanes of UK motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are these drivers allowed to get away with it?  Overtaking lanes are there for overtaking only.  The Government should stand up and not throw in the towel to the well-known top gear presenter-type wing of what many safety and environmentally-conscious, law abiding citizens characterise as the totally myopic, insane behaviour of the "I'm OK Jack ** you" brigade.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
